list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: clothes and linens that need to be washed or that have been newly washed.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she went outside to hang some laundry on the line
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đi ra ngoài để treo một ít đồ giặt trên đường dây

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a room in a house, hotel, or institution where clothes and linens can be washed and ironed.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the pathology department was in the hospital basement, next to the laundry
